# sperax-crypto-mcp

> MCP server and plugin for Sperax Protocol – USDs, SPA, veSPA & Demeter on Arbitrum and BNB Chain. Listed on Anthropic's official MCP Registry.

## Overview

sperax-crypto-mcp is an open-source project by nirholas. MCP server and plugin for Sperax Protocol – USDs, SPA, veSPA & Demeter on Arbitrum and BNB Chain. Listed on Anthropic's official MCP Registry.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/sperax-crypto-mcp
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
